title: Apache Yakyuugun (Apache Baseball Team)
synopsis: A former baseball star who suffered a career crippling injury takes over as coach of a team of misfits in a poor village high school.
voices: ['Ootake, Hiroshi', 'Tanaka, Ryouichi', 'Asakura, Rie', 'Tsuboi, Akiko', 'Noda, Keiichi', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Tomita, Kousei', 'Midorikawa, Minoru', 'Nojima, Akio', 'Yamada, Keaton']
